Method Detail

areEqual

public static boolean areEqual(java.lang.Object x,
                               java.lang.Object y)
Returns true iff given objects are same by meaning of reference or by meaning of equals() method. The first condition applies that this method returns true also when the both objects are null.

Parameters:
x - the first compared object.
y - the second compared object.
Returns:
true iff given objects are same by meaning of reference or by meaning of equals() method.
